import { Component } from "react"; import { confirmAlert } from 'react-confirm-alert'; class Main extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = ({ home: null, history: null }) } componentDidMount(){ this.activeLink(); } activeLink(){ const currentUrl = window.location.href; const uriSegment = currentUrl.split('/'); const pageActive = uriSegment[4]; const fillterUrl = pageActive.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9-_]/g, ''); this.setState({ [fillterUrl]: 'active' }) } render(){ return(
